Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ETHICS AND INTERNAL GOVERNANCE
REFERRED TO ETHICS AND INTERNAL GOVERNANCE

Title: Requires the forfeiture by state officers or local officers of STAR exemption eligibility upon conviction of a felony related to public employment
Summary: Requires the forfeiture by state officers or local officers of STAR exemption eligibility upon conviction of a felony related to public employment.
LawCode: Add ยง74-b, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to requiring the forfeiture by state officers or local officers of STAR exemption eligibility upon conviction of a felony related to public employment
